name: NFT ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023
description:
MetalEmissive is an artistic series of 3D NFTs designed by [**Universelle**](https://universelle.io/en) for the [**NOX** brand](https://noxsport.es).

This UNIQUE NFT presents a 3D replica of the ML10 PRO CUP LTD23 racket, from the official NOX player Miguel Lamperti.
Created digitally with the highest level of detail, it faithfully reproduces each and every one of the original elements of the blades. Finally, it is endowed with a light emission effect, which becomes the artistic element that provides the link with the rest of the unique MetalEmissive NFTs created from this one, and having an added value for being the source and origin of the serialized NFTs of the collection.

attributes.value: 10% off for life in NOX products (in NOX online store)
Gift of physical racket ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023
Gift of Serial NFT ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023
Gift of M. Lamperti Decentraland Wearable
Double Invitation to the World Padel Tour Barcelona (December 2022)
Delivery in person of the racket ML10 PRO CUP LTD 2023 by Miguel Lamperti
